EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2017-4-04-Live Demo Series UK.Promotion #2
EmailTemplate.subject: Next Week: Top 3 Challenges BEFORE Moving to the Public Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Next week, Turbonomic is launching a European webinar series, and the first topic is: Top 3 Things to Consider On-Prem Before Moving to the Public Cloud to be held on Tuesday, April 4 at 12 PM GMT and Thursday, April 6 at 2 PM GMT In this webinar we will address the common challenges and questions to consider on your hybrid cloud journey related to sizing/cost, workload dependencies and governance. Be sure to register today and mark the date in your diary!
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/operations-manager-live-demo-series/]]>
